text: Uff Yeh !Nadaniyan (English: Mad) is an Indian television Family drama series about a defense attorney, that airs on BIG Magic. During the third season, one of the stars, Dheeraj Kumar, directed one of the episodes. == References == ==External links== * * Category:Indian drama television series Category:Indian legal television series Category:2010 Indian television series debuts
title: Nadaniyan Serial
